website_summaries.verdict: A decent French fry cutter for those who make homemade fries fairly regularly.
pros: Comes with 2 blades and a cleaning brush
Doesn't require a lot of strength to use
cons: Ratchet design makes cutting slower than the one-push designs
Doesn't work well on sweet potatoes

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use, loud as hell.
customer_reviews.text: Complete piece of you-know-what. Broke on the first use, second potatoe. Loud as all hell and IMPOSSIBLE to clean. Huge disappointment. Bad enough to go though Amazons return process and drive to the post office. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it cuts the potato but I would not recommend it and I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is way too cumbersome to use for more than a couple of potatoes. You'll wear yourself out. You have to use multiple "pumping" action (ratchet mechanism) to cut the food item. My old one would cut the entire potato in one push of the lever. Does it cut the potato...yes. However, I would not recommend it and I would not buy it again. It just takes too long and requires too much energy. There are others that do the same thing with much great ease and at about the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: tenpin

customer_reviews.title: This cutter works GREAT. I have tried a lot of veggies and ...
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a french fry cutter to use with the new "air fryer" we had purchased. I read many reviews, and we thought the commercial ones were a bit too much. This cutter works GREAT. I have tried a lot of veggies and everything works. It can be stopped in stages for cubing, comes with a clean-up brush, and disassembles with a couple of clicks. It is less than 2 minutes to clean by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ted W Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrot sticks!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cutter! I actually use it for carrots and it is a breeze to use. I do about 3 lbs at a time, it takes about 30 minutes with this machine. When I was hand cutting them it took about 3 times that! Blades are sharp and easy to clean. One thing I would have done differently if I had known, I would have ordered the black, the white is already stained from the carrots!😉😉
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Heimann

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on medium size potatoes & for dicing celery. I would give it 5 but because of the plastic construction it doesn't feel like it will hold up over the long term. pushing a medium potato through felt like it was almost too much for the lever and the guid came off several times when I was dicing the celery, but otherwise I am completely satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brinda

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter for making French Fries
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the cutter to make french fries so far. It is doing a great job and I have enjoyed the fries. I use the small cutter blade as I like my fries narrow and small. works great. I have worried about the pressure I need to use to push the potatoes through the cutter that the hard plastic will hold up. So far it has been okay. Can't seem to get enough of those fries. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ARTHUR L. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to make sweet potato fries
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make sweet potato fries, this didn't cut the fries at all. Came in a plastic bag, not box, with no instructions. Wouldn't recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Horrible horrible product. I bought this to cut potatoes to make French fries, and was happy to see it advertised for this specific purpose. Well, worst purchase I've ever made. I tried to cut one potato, and it got completely stuck. I couldn't get it out and cut my hands in 3 different places trying to remove the potato. Ended up throwing the whole thing in the trash, with the potato still stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the perfect kitchen tool for making french fries, diced potatoes, whatever. Obviously it says not for sweet potatoes, but went through 10 pounds of potatoes diced in less than 30 minutes. I've give it more stars if I could. It's made of a very hard plastic and cleans easily! Plan on getting a 2nd one for use in my camper.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good French fry maker, It has lasted me a long time- it makes regular cut fries. I had wanted another one to make skinny fries, but it was not skinny...so I had to return it, or I would have had 2 of the smame model but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest item.
customer_reviews.text: Have to use a lot of force to push onions, etc. through the blades. I had to make a fist and pound on the handle to get the food through. The device also leaves plastic shavings in the food. I am unable to locate where they are being cut from. Works very well if all you send throught it is potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: You don't need to spend more...this French Fry cutter does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I checked out all the cutters on the market and settled on this model for ease of use, cleaning and price. Love the dicing feature. The ratcheting device works perfectly. It helps so you don't have to use a lot of force to get the Potato through. I thought I'd be disappointed in the lack of a 3rd size blade, but I'm not missing it at all. Potatoes, onions and zucchini have been successfully cut and served...on to carrots tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use and the first time we tried potatoes in it the blade broke.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Riely/Tricia Downs

customer_reviews.title: It’s left me very disappointed.: ( if the blades were thicker and ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine busted the 1st time I used it. The blades bent and became warped and some fell out. It’s left me very disappointed. :( if the blades were thicker and sturdier this would be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tinklms

customer_reviews.title: Metal screens/grid broke and bent trying to cut a sweet potato into fries
customer_reviews.text: Metal screens/grid broke and bent trying to cut a sweet potato into fries. Not impressed, spend the extra money and get a decent fry cutter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to USE
customer_reviews.text: Even though the device goes together simply and easily, read the instructions! I touched everything except the blades which seemed the right thing not to do. Using the cutter was fun! We tried filling the space with multiple pieces (cucumbers) and in no time had diced cucumbers. Some foods with tough skins did not do a final push too well (Tomatoes). In general, it was fun to use, easy clean up! Just treat the blades with respect and no one gets cut!
customer_reviews.author: Jan D. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was definitely worth the buy! The numerous blades it comes with makes cutting whatever you need easy! I've diced onions and made french fries and it works great! -It's super easy to assemble and take apart! -Easy to clean -Seems durable
customer_reviews.author: Tannor Fortin

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: returned mine after the first time using it this week! I would not recommend Metal bar broke as food was going through.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Overmire

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do the job! Thumbs down!
customer_reviews.text: Tried to cut a potato and pulled the metal cutting part right from the plastic. Had to return with potato stuck in it! Might work for softer items... Very nice otherwise. Thought I was in love.... Broke my "potatoes"
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie I Cole

customer_reviews.title: Slices and dices great. Easier to use than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Slices and dices great. Easier to use than I thought. I would recommend this to anyone. It is well made and takes little effort to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Golson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take apart and wash
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical on how this would actually work and the durability. I was able to use it to make diced potatoes and French fries already and only had it 3 days! Easy to take apart and wash!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for cutting vegetables, potatoes or sweet potato fries. Easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Tiger Chef French Fry Cutter and Vegetable Dicer Chopper
customer_reviews.text: I received My Tiger Chef French Fry Cutter I used it right away, It was great, easy and fast. I made the best French Fry I have ever made. I love How easy it was to use it. Best Buy, Try It. You will be delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Dorthy Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Best invention since the french fry
customer_reviews.text: This is one very handy tool! easily and uniformly cuts potatoes and other veggies for perfect fries and other uses. Much easier on my wrists than the repetitive motion required for manual cutting and uniformity means even cooking. Light weight and easy to clean/store. With all my other kitchen gadgets, compact tools are much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: Tiger  Chef French fry cutter
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered the Tiger chef French fry cutter they sent me a broken Product, but they replaced it. the second time it didn’t work at all. I would never recommend this product to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: Nevada Envy Love

customer_reviews.title: Looks easy to use on commercials
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what we expected it to be. Looks easy to use on commercials. Not so easy to use at home. Disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: patricia moubray

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Waste Your Money - Great Idea but it will not cut hard vegetables
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This inexpensive product is a great idea and worked great to cut cucumbers. Then I tried carrots. Made it through 2 before the blades blew out the front of the cutter. Save your money and buy a higher quality cutter. This one just will not hold up to cutting normal vegetable.
customer_reviews.author: KDLSDAD

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. NOT ONLY CUTS VEGGIES BUT CUTS PREP TIME ...
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. NOT ONLY CUTS VEGGIES BUT CUTS PREP TIME TOO. DON'T EVER WANT TO BE WITHOUT ONE !
customer_reviews.author: Mario Minnella

customer_reviews.title: Cutter
customer_reviews.text: This cutter works fine. I have made a few cuts and it is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M.

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very unhappy. I wanted to exchange it because I thought I was getting a stainless steel and it was plastic. The email I received back was kind of rude as well. I'll never order from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Maplesden

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I have RA in my hands and returned this item because I needed something else that would not hurt them. I still have four stars because the item looked well made and had quality. Would be perfect for another person without RA.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Simple Design. Easy to change attachments. Easy to clean. I use this mainly for camp fried potatoes. I can have perfect diced potatoes for 6 people in a couple of minutes. French fries in the convection oven also work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E.

customer_reviews.title: Other than being plastic it’s almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely engineered but I’m not a big fan of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Agent 87

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, hard to clean, and I couldn't it to work with Onions, they just got all smashed and wouldn't come through.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done but its I'd harde to push than my old one. And you have to cute the potato basically in half before you can use it. Very sharp cut myself through the plastic taking it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: Cut a big fat potato but was a lot easier to slice down center, but it really works well.
customer_reviews.author: c adams

customer_reviews.title: Earlier to use than the old styles.
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use than the original ones of placing food on top of slicer and mashing it down.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Woks good, but don't use to big of a potato.
customer_reviews.author: JTD

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, but it broke during the first use.
customer_reviews.text: It was going so well and I was almost done cutting when I looked down and the blades were broken. Great concept and super simple to use, but NOT strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: C. VanBorkum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what was described and arrived on time,
customer_reviews.author: msween313

customer_reviews.title: Not at all bad.  Does a good job with regular fries.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, and cuts regular fries great. The ratchet helps make the job easy. The only draw back is that sweet potatoes are too hard and are difficult to cut with this cutter. Otherwise it is great!
customer_reviews.author: fish-head

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for potatoes.... not designed for sweet potatoes..too hard for the blades
customer_reviews.author: lili

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick chopping. Easy to use, small enough to store, easy to clean, and cuts well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Boggs

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. I have only used it a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. I have only used it a couple of times. Had to get one after I got my Air Fryer it makes cutting French fries so much easier. I did a lot of research before I decided to get this one. It had really good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Not big enouth for a medium and larger ornion or potato
customer_reviews.text: Works great on small onions for dicing and medium and smaller potatoes for slicing. Definitely not big enough for larger onions or potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband to replace a French fry cutter he’s worn out. This product is cheaply made & the first potato he tried got stuck. The pusher is plastic & he feared it would break if he applied enough pressure to get the potato through.
customer_reviews.author: SusanB

customer_reviews.title: French Fry Cutter cuts Cleanly and Easily
customer_reviews.text: The French fry cutter saves time and uniformly cuts the food in the cutter.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Air fryer FF are great
customer_reviews.text: Great for French fries. Sweet potatoes are too hard, have to soften them by precooking them.
customer_reviews.author: MLR

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Leaves plastic shavings in the food. I am unable to locate where they are being cut from. Also had trouble with some onions! I went in the trash!!! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WILDA J MILLER

customer_reviews.title: This cutter makes it so easy to cut French fries
customer_reviews.text: This cutter makes it so easy to cut French fries, really like the way it works. I didn’t need a commercial one just one for home use and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lilah Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Nice Veggie Chopper
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several over the years, but this one by far is the best one I've ever purchased. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Made life easy.
customer_reviews.text: This French Fry cutter has made making fries at home a breeze. Will definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elerineye

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Blades ratcheting​ system works excellent going to give another as
customer_reviews.text: Sharp Blades ratcheting​ system works excellent going to give another as gift
customer_reviews.author: Terry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t what was expected from description. So not pleased, hoping to find a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Too many parts
customer_reviews.text: Only cuts 2 different ways I thought it would slide too but it doesn't
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Hillerich

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT I WISH IT HAS MORE CUTTING SHAPES FOR IT ...
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT I WISH IT HAS MORE CUTTING SHAPES FOR IT LET ME KNOW IF YOU HAVE DIFFERENT CUTTING DEVISES
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far. But it was simple and reliable. Should work for a good while longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Broke!
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first time I used it. Tried to dice a large carrot and blew the blades riggt out.
customer_reviews.author: lynn herrema

customer_reviews.title: ratchets
customer_reviews.text: the ratchet is the biggest thing going for this unit. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph W. Stettenbenz

customer_reviews.title: Better buy small veggies for this dicer
customer_reviews.text: Opening is so small you have to cut the onion and then it falls apart trying to smash it thru dicer.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product! The hardened plastic and well thought out design worked extremely well even with the sweet potatos. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Drahota

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This has been a very good product. It's easy to use and very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Anthony Fincher

customer_reviews.title: good  and useful kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: dicing mushrooms onions and of coarse French fries it worked great
customer_reviews.author: .wilhal

customer_reviews.title: Tiger Chef
customer_reviews.text: The french fries came out great and...easy Only problem, I don't know how to do the chopper - no instructions
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Barilotti

customer_reviews.title: Works really good, with some of the really big potatoes
customer_reviews.text: Works really good, with some of the really big potatoes, it struggles a little right at the end, over all a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: BAknife

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean! Just wish it had a case.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: At first I was sceptical but I figured it out and it works great! I made fries and diced countless cheeses and veggies! It's a great design! Blades are sharp and slice easily. Dishwasher safe. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Zivic

customer_reviews.title: Would buy from again and recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Item came before expected and as advertised. Exceeded my expectations. Would buy from again and recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Gary Edmerson

customer_reviews.title: ... first use of using the dicing option to cut sweet potatoes it already broke
customer_reviews.text: On my first use of using the dicing option to cut sweet potatoes it already broke. I used it for all of 5 minutes and will have to trash it. The mechanism to push potatoes constantly pops out.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product but does not Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but it does have one major issue. The major issue is with the blades which after about a month of use have began the bend and break. I would suggest that you spend a little bit more and get a sturdier product as this is not worth the money based on the durability.
customer_reviews.author: james dillion

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this device! It saves me so much time cutting potatoes quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Devlin

customer_reviews.title: perfect french fry cutter.
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly no complaints at all!. I love the ratchet like movement. And the included brush makes cleaning it much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Erok

customer_reviews.title: Its a toy
customer_reviews.text: Its not very easy to cut potatoes. I needed a heavier duty machine.
customer_reviews.author: Champaa

customer_reviews.title: Blades bent/broke on only 4th or 5th use from a sweet potato
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the blades bent/broke while using this on a sweet potato. It was only the 4th or 5th time using it, and now it's useless without the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product. I purchased it as a gift for a friend. When it arrived, it was all loose pieces in the brown shipping box. Not only was it not even packed in an actual product box, but it also did not come with any instructions on how to assemble it, use it, or how to clean and care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The plastic housing broke apart after only a few uses, I would not waste your money on this. Go to a restaurant supply store and buy a metal one. They are more expensive but they will last longer than a week
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Easy to use, easy to clean. For the price, this product can't be beaten. The adapter plate that lets you cut vegetables (of whatever) into cubes is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Great in theory, however the blades are extremely flimsy and the very first time I used it, on a sweet potato no less, it broke immediately. And by broke I mean shards of fractured blades and plastic stuck in the sweet potato broke.....
customer_reviews.author: The MacDonalds

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It arrived fine it works great we make French fries 2-3 times a week with it that's all we have used it for since that is why we got it. We have been using it for 3 weeks or so an it seems to be holding together and all I like it an recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sweet potatoes
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a good idea...BUT... it broke on a sweet potato. I wanted to make sweet potato fries, but will now have to use a knife. Sweet potatoes are very dense and hard to cut. I tried to use a mandolin, was successful except it was a struggle to push the potato through the blades. I will continue to look for a sweet potato cutter than will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible item! Super cheap. See picture for what happened when we tried to make sweet potato fries.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used enough to really tate
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once but it did a real good job.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be just what I wanted...received it today..haven't used yet
customer_reviews.author: charles peterson

customer_reviews.title: These are working perfect! We ordered 12
customer_reviews.text: These are working perfect! We ordered 12, one did not work, but the rest are really nice! We put them on a wall that runs next to our sidewalk. When someone comes down the walk the light is more than efficient to show them the way and then they dim back down after a minute or once people have left the area. But they are always on. Sun is definitely vital though for these to work their best.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Meiferdt

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely buy single purpose kitchen tools. We have an air fryer, and trying to perfect french fries. Our old cutter is one of those you push down by hand on a potato. Not easy. I love the ratcheting mechanism on this cutter. It works quickly and with little effort. This is very cleverly designed. It makes 3/8" and 1/2" cuts, but also easily allows dicing as well. (A 3/8" cut is recommended by American Test Kitchen for making fries in an air fryer.)
customer_reviews.author: R. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this back in October of 2018 but didn't actually use it until today, January 28th, 2019. Just hadn't had a use for it. I bought it because it actually looked pretty sturdy. THIS LITTLE UNIT IS A WONDER!!! I am so pleased with the ease with which it works!! It doesn't feel cheap and skimpy like a couple of other items I had bought before this. You want perfect fries without fear of losing your fingers! THEN THIS IS THE UNIT FOR YOU!!! 💜
customer_reviews.author: Ronna D. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: This is the Fry Cutter You Want
customer_reviews.text: One of the most compact and best designs out there for french fry cutters. It's super easy to cut them and they are perfect size too. No need to mount anything to the wall or counter like I've seen in reviews of other cutters. If you have an air fryer, this french fry cutter is a must have companion for it! Remember, no sweet potatoes. Seriously. You will trash your cutter and be a sad panda.
customer_reviews.author: T. Boehnlein

customer_reviews.title: Slow.
customer_reviews.text: We went with the cheap plastic model, don't do it. Sure, it works, if you have the patience for the plastic to slowly ratchet your way thru a potato. I will probably now buy the one I should have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey12

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t even figure out how to use it! It feels very like very cheap and delicate material. I also bought the Mueller onion chopper pro at the same time because I wanted to try them both and had to chop lots of carrots, onions and tomatoes and thank God I bought the Muellers pro because I never got figure out this other garbage.
customer_reviews.author: marcar

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this may be too hard for me to use because I have serious issues with both my hands and arms-struggle to open jars and such. I was very pleased that it's truly easy to use. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amy♡giraffes

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointing
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept, but plastic will not last long. Second use and pieces of plastic were shaved off the pusher. Had to pick plastic shavings out of the french fries. It's not at all as easy as it looks or sounds. Certainly not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bonny G

customer_reviews.title: not as adverticed.
customer_reviews.text: you make a potatoe going threw look easy..NO, Carrot No, I am not a weakling so I felt I had been taken. Directions were very limited.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Make Wonderful Fries.
customer_reviews.text: It makes perfect fries. They are all even. It's a bit hard on the wrist and takes some strength to push the potatoes through the slots. I found that if I use a pad of towel it is easier. It does make a whacking noise when you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Sted

customer_reviews.title: Two months and it broke
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to make regular fries and it was difficult. I used it tonight to make sweet potato fries and the blade broke. I paid $30 for this and I am extremely disappointed because the manufacturer said it would work. :(
customer_reviews.author: JMarie

customer_reviews.title: Real time saver!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about two months ago. Using it for the first time today. This chopper is incredibly easy to use and saved me a huge amount of time. It feels durable and it's easy to take apart and clean
customer_reviews.author: Jen-O-Bear

customer_reviews.title: I needed this
customer_reviews.text: t Tried it, works as shown. Hope plastic parts do not wear out because I love how this pushes potato out in increments that does not stress my broken arm. great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri L. Doty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Iove this! It's so easy to be able to dice potatoes into cubes. And makes tough sweet potatoes a breeze to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: the resulting product is perfect. I was hoping for a metal unit but ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of grunt to push the onions through the blades but once started it gets easier. the resulting product is perfect. I was hoping for a metal unit but this should hold up well too. Does what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: H. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: it's great. Cuts everything uniformly
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bit of work to get it set up, but it really cuts well. I wish there was a smaller grid, though. If you're doing a massive amount of carrot sticks, french fries, or celery stick, it's great. Cuts everything uniformly.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Howell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s sturdy and works fine. Says not to use with sweet potatoes, but there are instructions to prepare sweet potatoes before using cutter. Yeah! Easy to use. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: C. Wild

product_meta.title: Tiger Chef French Fry Cutter and Easy Vegetable Dicer Chopper With 2 Interchangeable Blades – Also Great for Onions, Carrots, Cucumbers and more – Comes with a Cleaning Brush
feature_bullets: - INCREASE EFFICIENCY: This great vegetable chopper dicer cuts food easily helping minimize prep time for French fries, salad bars, soups and other food prep requirements. Not recommended to use for Sweet Potatoes.
- EASY OPERATION: Effort-saving ratchet-style pusher moves food easily through the sharp stainless steel blades.

- MULTIPURPOSE: This kitchen pro dicer comes with two interchangeable stainless steel blades and plates, (25 and 45 hole options) and a knife guide to evenly cut or dice the food in any length with a knife
- EASY TO CLEAN: We’ve added a great cleaning brush to help you clean this cutter, and avoid cuts from its sharp edges. Dishwasher safe
- BEST GIFT FOR PARENTS & FRIENDS. Except being used as French fry cutter, it also dices vegetables like carrots and cucumbers, perfect for everyone. Backed by 100% satisfaction money-back guarantee.
